title: Sir Oliver Joseph Lodge: mathematical physicist
brief_description: An historic film of Sir Oliver Lodge, mathematical physicist and winner of the 1932 Faraday Medal. Sir Oliver, in his 84th year, reviews the electrical age, recalling the early days of discovery including the first dynamo, and incandescent lamp, Alexander Graham Bell demonstrating the telephone, and the work of Hertz.
